file_content.text: You're making a mistake!
I'm the only one with the strength to defend Alderaan against the Empire!
No one will judge you except by the evidence of your actions.
You'll get a fair trial.
And when Alderaan falls to the Empire and our people are sold into slavery? Who'll judge me then?
You can never threaten Alderaan again.
You're too dangerous to live.
Without me, Alderaan will fall! You'll see! You'll see!
Lock him in restraints. There's a transport outside.
So... I'm guessing he resisted arrest?
Congratulations. Not many people can say they brought down a king.
Commander Bradel will want to thank you himself.
Report.
Bouris Ulgo will never again threaten Alderaan.
He's dead.
Ah. A sorry end for a man we once all admired.
I hope you've got a strong holding cell on the ship.
He's in custody.
Oh, yes. I'm sure Bouris Ulgo was not one to go quietly.
Alderaan belongs to the Republic once more.
The throne is ours.
In defending his world from the Empire, the power went to his head.
His motives were good.
The usurper is dead, sir. The throne of Alderaan is in Republic hands again.
We have the usurper in custody, sir. The Republic holds the throne.
It's not that simple.
You've done more than the combined might of the Empire and Republic could--freed the throne from Bouris Ulgo.
But it will still be a fierce battle to keep the Empire from consuming this world.
We must defeat the Empire everywhere its tentacles creep into our galaxy.
A battle we will win.
I know you have dedicated your life to ensure this.
The hearts of Alderaan's people are strong. They will resist.
A battle Alderaan must win.
The people of Alderaan will rally around us.
We can do it.
Alderaan has not faced true war in many generations. It will take all their courage to prevail.
Why is it that nothing's ever really over with you people? We won. Be happy!
Oh, stop moaning!
You're right. You deserve--we all deserve--to celebrate this victory.
You're right.
I cannot hold you here any longer.
Thank you for your service. Alderaan is one step closer to freedom because of you.
So. I wondered who would be the first to try for this seat.
I didn't expect an offworlder. Who sent you? The Organas? Those broken fools the Panteers?
What's your stake in this?
Alderaan will not fall. To the Empire or to you.
I serve the Republic.
Never hurts to do the Republic a favor.
I'm just helping out.
You won't win the throne over the bodies of your victims.
I'm bringing you to justice.
I'm not here to talk.
Has the Republic forgotten? I won the Battle of Rordak by personally boarding Moff Ceptor's battle cruiser!
What did the Panteers ever do except abandon the Republic when the Senate faced a tough decision?
The Panteers' folly has allowed the Thuls to return. If I had not stepped forward, the Empire would have Alderaan!
You can't fight the Empire by becoming just like them.
You're a tyrant.
I did what I had to. Do you think that fool Gaul Panteer could have held off the Empire?
Perhaps your motives were noble, but I feel the lust for power that now holds your heart.
Power corrupts.
I deserve the perks of royalty! I'm the one holding this planet together. Let them pay tribute!
If you'd come to us, the Republic would have supported you.
You shouldn't have gone rogue.
The Republic's too in love with those twittering Organas. They could never stand against the Empire.
So, the crown, beautiful women and piles of money didn't influence you at all....
I doubt your motive was pure.
I did this for Alderaan!
You have no right to judge me. This is my world, and I'll die before I see it in someone else's hands.
If you don't resist, I promise you'll receive a fair trial.
Come peacefully.
A trial? I should get a medal!
Then defend your throne!
To arms, men! Defend the throne. For Alderaan!
So now what?
Not my battle.
